scripts.start: npm run start:api && npm run start:app
scripts.start:api: cd cypress-diary-api && pm2 start --name cypress-diary-api npm -- run start && pm2 save && cd ../
scripts.start:app: cd cypress-diary-app && pm2 start --name cypress-diary-app npm -- run start && pm2 save && cd ../
scripts.stop: pm2 delete cypress-diary-api && pm2 delete cypress-diary-app && pm2 save --force
scripts.test:coverage-api: cd cypress-diary-api && DB_HOST=localhost DB_USER=root DB_PASS=password DB_DATABASE=cypress-diary pm2 start --name cypress-diary-api npm -- run start:coverage && pm2 save && cd ../
scripts.test:coverage-app: cd cypress-diary-app && pm2 start --name cypress-diary-app npm -- run start && pm2 save && cd ../
scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf .nyc_output && rm -rf coverage && npm run test:coverage-app && npm run test:coverage-api && npx cypress run && pm2 delete cypress-diary-api && pm2 delete cypress-diary-app && pm2 save --force
